remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsPersonalizationAuthorization> class provides configuration support for personalization authorizations for Web Parts. This class can be used to allow or deny access to Web Parts resources.
## Examples The following configuration-file example shows how to declaratively specify values for properties of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsPersonalizationAuthorization> class.
``` <system.web> <webParts> <personalization> <authorization> <deny users="*" verbs="enterSharedScope" /> <allow users="*" verbs="modifyState" /> </authorization> </personalization> </webParts> </system.web> ```

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of rules used for personalization authorization related to Web Parts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRuleCollection> consists of <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule> objects. An <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule> object contains an <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule.Action%2A> property, a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule.Users%2A> property, and a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule.Verbs%2A> property. These properties can be set to allow or deny access to a Web Parts resource.
